title: Executive Order 9859-Revoking Executive Order No. 9196 of July 9, 1942
content: Under and by virtue of the authority vested in me as President of the United States, Executive Order No. 9196 of July 9, 1942, entitled "Government Purchases of Prison-made Goods" is hereby revoked.

HARRY S. TRUMAN
THE WHITE HOUSE,
May 31, 1947
citation: Harry S Truman, Executive Order 9859-Revoking Executive Order No. 9196 of July 9, 1942 Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/278998
